description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Crusoe's Island: a ramble in the footsteps of Alexander Selkirk. With sketches of adventure in California and Washoe" Author: Browne, J. Ross (John Ross) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.bb.12." Page: 341 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1864 Publisher: Harper & Bros. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000498039 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
